Class SimpleHex

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleHex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hex, java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleHex
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hex, java.io.Serializable
    This corresponds to a trio of rhombs, all of which share a common point and any two of which share a common edge. The union of three such rhombs is a hexagon, and that hexagon can be flipped by shifting all the rhombs to opposite sides of the hex.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • contains
